headline: Charles Schwab (NYSE:SCHW) Faces Shareholder Activism As Shares Drop 11%
summary: The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) is currently grappling with shareholder activism centered around board structure proposals pushed by John Chevedden. The company's board opposes these proposals ahead of the annual meeting scheduled for May 22, 2025. This governance tussle coincided with broader market downturns as global trade tensions spurred by sweeping tariffs led to economic uncertainty and heightened market volatility, evidenced by significant indices like the Dow and S&P 500...
